title: Radka Bednaříková
text:
Radka Bednaříková (born 18 December 1990) is a <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> <a href="women%27s%20association%20football">football</a> <a href="goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>, currently playing for <a href="SK%20Sigma%20Olomouc%20%28women%29">Sigma Olomouc</a> in the <a href="Czech%20Second%20Division%20%28women%29">Czech Second Division</a>.
She is a member of the <a href="Czech%20Republic%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Czech national team</a>. She made her debut on 26 November 2010 in a match against <a href="Hungary%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Hungary</a>.
